@@ -33,9 +33,9 @@
       <input formControlName="size" class="form-control mb-2" placeholder="Size">
       <input formControlName="color" class="form-control mb-2" placeholder="Color">
 
       <label>Select Image</label>
-      <select class="form-control" formControlName="image_id" (change)="onImageSelect(i, $event.target.value)">
+      <select class="form-control" formControlName="image_id" (change)="onImageSelect(i, $event)">
         <option [value]="''">-- Select Image --</option>
         <option *ngFor="let img of images.controls" [value]="img.value.image_id">
           {{ img.value.image_id }} - {{ img.value.alt }}
         </option>
